channel.title: All American Pk, a REAL private server. [UPDATED 4/7/09]
channel.description:
[center]
FIRST OFF I AM Gh0st Jr! we just moved and my e-mail got deleted and my cookies got reset, i asked Chassy13 to remove my other topic because i wanted to update it and she said i could re-post after she deleted. [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2w5r41g.png[/img]
[b]PLEASE POST! i want to know what you think/might want me to change, imagine this as a server that you would want to play on.[/b]
UPDATED 4/7/09
Some added interfaces:
NO THEY ARE NOT SWATS!! I MADE ON MY OWN SWATS ARE INCORRECT!
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/149ulug.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/fbch78.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/261c2lk.png[/img]
THIS IS SWATS
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/24zenu1.png[/img]
PREVIEW OF UPDATE FOR G.E [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/ok5s40.png[/img]
[URL=http://s268.photobucket.com/player.swf?file=http://vid268.photobucket.com/albums/jj40/Gh0stJr/noclip.flv&fs=1&os=1&ap=1] FIXED NO CLIPPING FOR PLAYERS AND TREES[/URL]
[URL=http://s268.photobucket.com/player.swf?file=http://vid268.photobucket.com/albums/jj40/Gh0stJr/AAPK2.flv&fs=1&os=1&ap=1]VID[/URL]
[URL=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gF32_QSgFXY]OMG FULL G.E!![/URL]
UPDATED: 3/27/09 added items:
- yes i have ALL skillcapes including hoods and non (t) [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/10nw6k6.png[/img]
- yes all bolts work with random hitting higher + gfxs (100% creds to I pk pigeons for bolts) [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2dtqij6.png[/img]
Pics:
[b]Working on:[/b] When casting a spell that freezes it immediately freezes you - 100% (done) Stackable death interface (for coins and rune) - 2%(had to de-compile a error)
[b]Features:[/b] - Leveling - All Skills - Full Pking - All magic spells - Complete range following -Pest control - Fight pits - Full wilderness - Working player defence, working npc defence - Fully working new prayer - 100% 1 v 1 in Edgville - Boss monsters - All skills working - All special attacks - Quests working - Working NEW lunar spellbook (Thanks zee best for the interface) - Barrows degrading - Crystal bow and shield degrading - Working player following and npc following - Keep the 3 most expensive items on death, 4 if you have protect 1 item on
AND MUCH MORE
Pics:
UPDATES:
Items on death (working on stackables)
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/25thi13.png[/img]
Character rotating + equipment (I did NOT use a tut, took me forever)
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/106g55w.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/sey7ms.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/fxwlzq.png[/img]
Clan Chat (yes buttons work including typing in the name)
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/15nx1yq.png[/img]
CLIPPED NPCS
[URL=http://s268.photobucket.com/albums/jj40/Gh0stJr/?action=view&current=clippednpc.flv]VID[/URL]
NPC freezing:
[URL=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M91_Kf1WltE]VID[/URL]
G.E
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gF32_QSgFXY
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2z7lz7b.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/35himop.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/1jn8ds.png[/img]

[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/5pg400.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2hfs19x.png[/img]
I AM THE CODER OF THE WIDE-SCREEN CLIENT:
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2aag67p.png[/img]
Cannon:
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/20rwcxg.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/o0ow82.png[/img]

Level 99 stuff: (dont have skillcape masters yet)

http://s268.photobucket.com/albums/jj40/Gh0stJr/?start=0

Comment/Post please.

item.title: All American Pk, a REAL private server. [UPDATED 4/7/09]
item.dc:creator: @Girona Girona
item.description:
@Girona wrote:

[quote=“Gh0stlyhack, post:61, topic:271471”][quote author=Girona link=topic=358226.msg2775702#msg2775702 date=1241515906]
Am I the only one that thinks he edited it?.. I mean, it’s a bit obvious.
[/quote]

No you arent, and anyone who thinks this is are complete idiots, a video showing all the action buttons and stuff?
AKA: GTFO NOT “PHOTOSHOPPED”

Wow, people are retared. Learn to post your OWN work next time. GG on getting busted.

I do believe this:

Arizona spoke to me about this. I allowed him to post, so any comments such as, “gh0st’s work!!11” will be removed.

is in check?[/quote]Actually you can still photoshop videos, so you must be a complete moron too

Read full topic

item.title: All American Pk, a REAL private server. [UPDATED 4/7/09]
item.dc:creator: @I_PK_Pigeons I PK Pigeons
item.description:
@I_PK_Pigeons wrote:

[quote=“Girona, post:43, topic:271471”][quote author=Master Chef link=topic=358226.msg2772694#msg2772694 date=1241313047]
Just watch… as soon as this is realeased a new revolution in servers is going to be realeased. This is going to be EPIC like Deltascape was!
[/quote]DeltaScape was just in epic-spam and flaming.
Also, if you didn’t notice, his already posted this a few times. He edits it with paint.[/quote]

What do you think is fake?
It’s all possible to make, just his sprites are shit.

When I first looked at it, I would’ve said the summoning interfaces are done in photoshop, but tbh it’s relatively easy and most of it done server side.

Since the npc’s on the interface are displayed through models.
Something similar to

    public void addItemToInterface(int id, int slot, int column, int amount)
        {
        outStream.createFrameVarSizeWord(34); // init item to smith screen
        outStream.writeWord(column); // Column Across Smith Screen =id of the inv
        outStream.writeByte(6); // Total Rows?
        outStream.writeDWord(slot); // Row Down The Smith Screen
        outStream.writeWord(id + 1); // item
        outStream.writeByte(amount); // how many there are?
        outStream.endFrameVarSizeWord();

        }

And he could just simply make the Summoning NPC heads items.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @jman7 jman7
item.description:
@jman7 wrote:

[quote=“Arizona, post:9, topic:271471”][quote author=primadude link=topic=358226.msg2735946#msg2735946 date=1239053459]

Fail Deltascape.

You sir are a fucking retard. This is a delta base yes, but delta doesnt have summoning, fixed noclips, wide screen and much more that this has…

Summoning in a 317 is something not worth creating.
Fixed no-clips is piss easy.
Widescreen; there is a tutorial for that. Widescreen is client side therefore does not belong to the Deltascape server.

You say I’m a retard? L2 Reality check before you open your shit filled mouth.
[/quote]

NOT delta, Richscape. No there is not a tut for wide-screen.[quote author=I PK Pigeons link=topic=358226.msg2735612#msg2735612 date=1239041137]
I like how there’s no credits for the models used.
[/quote]

oh so sorry. ill get.

Fail Deltascape.

You sir are a fucking retard. This is a delta base yes, but delta doesnt have summoning, fixed noclips, wide screen and much more that this has…

Summoning in a 317 is something not worth creating.
Fixed no-clips is piss easy.
Widescreen; there is a tutorial for that. Widescreen is client side therefore does not belong to the Deltascape server.

You say I’m a retard? L2 Reality check before you open your shit filled mouth.

and yes you are, Your clients aren’t very good, as well as your server.[/quote]

wow ok wow, guys lay of the man, its NOT leeched. its re-coded. and 317 summoning is GOOD.
personally u just flame on other ppls work bcuz u CANT do it urself. u can warn me report be but
thats bcuz u know its true.
its a DELTA BASED, but its not leeched.

btw nice server, and do u need any coders or anything, pm me if u do. i can add crowns specs. home. tut island and more.

Read full topic
